doc.field: Record Group 8. Alumni and alumni-relations (1891-2015; 28.5 linear feet)
Record Group 8. Alumni and alumni-relations (1891-2015; 28.5 linear feet)

Correspondence and related papers from the Alumni Association. Subject matter mostly involves membership, payment of dues, events (annual dinners, reunions, social dinners and dances), and coordination with the school and Ethical Culture Society. A large portion of correspondence is from the papers of Robert Eiserman, longtime secretary of the Association. This includes a small amount of correspondence with Felix Adler. Non-correspondence items include early copies of the Association's constitution, lists of members, membership applications, ephemera, and reports from the Association's Executive Committee or Treasurer. 1909 correspondence includes responses to an alumni questionnaire on the value of scholarships.
